pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vaccine Induced Cellular Immunogenicity with Bivariate Modeling // A shiny app for accurate estimation of vaccine induced immunogenicity with bivariate linear modeling. Method is detailed in: Lhomme E, Hejblum BP, Lacabaratz C, Wiedemann A, Lelivre J-D, Levy Y, Thiebaut R Richert L (2019). Submitted.
